0.post_text: The new BMW S 1000 RR is more powerful than before, delivering an impressive 199 horsepower. Torque has been increased by 2 - 5 Nm and the output curve improved from 4,500 rpm. up. The throttle valves are electronically controlled using the new electromotive throttle actuator technology.

15.post_text:

Cruise calmly into new frontiers with the elegant BMW 4 Series. Or, excel in your endeavours with the superior performance of the stunning BMW 5 Series.

Enjoy 0% interest on loan tenure for selected BMW models! Alternatively, drive home a BMW from as low as $1,410*/month with Performance Direct.

Visit Performance Motors or call 6653 8052 to book a test drive.

20.post_text:
We are moving to serve you better. Starting from Feb 2015, Performance Motors at Sime Darby Centre, 896 Dunearn Road will be moving to a bigger and newer facility to serve you better.

For BMW Service Appointments, you may send in your BMW to our newest and largest BMW Fast Lane facility in Asia at Sime Darby Business Centre, 315 Alexandra Road. 

Book your next-day BMW Service Appointment using the Performance Care app or call 1800-CALL-BMW (1800-2255-269).

For Sales enquiries on the latest BMW models, visit us at our flagship Sime Darby Performance Centre, 303 Alexandra Road, or call 6319 0100 to reserve a test drive today.

We apologise for any inconvenience caused.
